item.description: Please Join me on Monday July 28th 2008 at 12 pm at the Venetian restuarant at 909 Broad St East weymouth Ma for a Business and Social networking meet-up where we will get together and grow our businesses. Be prepared to talk about your business and what your goals are for the coming year. Expect to pay a modest amount for a delicious lunch which you can order off the menu. It is importand for Business owners like ourselves to meet and know many "friends" so we can promote each other at this networking meetup
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a red Jacket and will have a smile on my face
item.name: Business networking and social meeting July Meetup
